title: The United States' Pre-Existing Conditions
description: How was the the richest and most powerful country in the world laid low by a virus only nanometers in size? Ed Yong, a science reporter for The Atlantic, says it's the inequities that have been with us for generations that made our body politic such opportunistic targets.

itunes:title: The United States' Pre-Existing Conditions
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: How was the the richest country in the world laid low by a virus only nanometers in size? One writer says it's due to the inequities that have been with us all along.
